snippet: The United States and Europe have accused Chinese solar panel manufacturers of benefiting from government subsidies.
abstract: News analysis; solar panel manufacturing industry in the United States and Europe has begun a volley of trade cases against Chinese imports, which they say have unfairly benefited from government subsidies; industry is following same track as the steel industry before it, and for many of the same reasons.
lead_paragraph: The United States and Europe have accused Chinese solar panel manufacturers of benefiting from government subsidies.

headline.main: For Solar Panel Industry, a Volley of Trade Cases
headline.print_headline: In Trade Cases, Solar Panel Industry Follows Lead of Steel Industry
